file(GLOB HEADERS_CORE core/*.h)
file(GLOB SOURCES_CORE core/*.cpp)

# create source group for IDEs
source_group(report FILES ${SOURCES_CORE} ${HEADERS_CORE})

# add files to main COPASI sources
set(COPASI_SOURCES ${COPASI_SOURCES} ${SOURCES_CORE})
set(COPASI_HEADERS ${COPASI_HEADERS} ${HEADERS_CORE})
